text: was a Japanese judoka, 9th degree black belt. He was an Olympic champion who competed in the -71 kg and -78 kg divisions in the 1992 Summer Olympics. He also won a silver medal at the 1996 Summer Olympics. Koga died of cancer on March 24, 2021 at the age of 53. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for Japan Category:Olympic silver medalists for Japan Category:Japanese judoka Category:Deaths from cancer
title: Toshihiko Koga
